title: G.C.E. Advanced Level (A/L) - Physical Science Stream
description: Excellent results in the Physical Science (Maths) stream are crucial. Mechatronics is an interdisciplinary field, so a strong foundation in Combined Mathematics and Physics is vital.

title: BSc Engineering Degree (Mechatronics/Robotics)
description: Complete a 4-year BScEng (Hons) degree with a specialization in Mechatronics Engineering. This degree integrates mechanical engineering, electronics, computer science, and control systems.

title: Graduate Mechatronics Engineer
description: Start your career in industries that rely on automation, such as manufacturing, apparel, or specialized tech companies. Your role will involve designing, building, and maintaining automated systems and robotic cells. Register with IESL as an Associate Member.

title: Automation / Robotics Engineer
description: As a specialized engineer, you'll be responsible for entire automation projects, from concept and design to implementation and commissioning. This requires strong project management and problem-solving skills.

title: Senior Automation Lead / R&D Engineer
description: Advance to a senior role where you lead the automation strategy for a company or work in R&D to develop novel robotic systems and products. A Master's or PhD is highly valuable for R&D roles.
qualifications: MSc/PhD in Robotics or a related field
institutes: N/A - Based on experience and further education
